title: Calamity chest

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Calamity chest is armour obtainable as a reward from the upcoming PvP Arena minigame. It can only be used in PvP combat, and requires no Defence level to be worn.

content:
Calamity chest is a temporary piece of content found only in unrestricted worlds.
The contents of this page refer to a piece of content only available on temporary unrestricted worlds as a means to test it before release.
Its design is subject to change, and the graphics are used as a placeholder.

The Calamity chest is armour obtainable as a reward from the upcoming PvP Arena minigame. It can only be used in PvP combat, and requires no Defence level to be worn.

It is worn in combination with the Calamity breeches to achieve the designated set effect, depending on which headgear is worn.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0+0+0
 Defence bonuses
+5+7+6+4+5
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+0List

The '''Calamity chest''' is [[armour]] obtainable as a reward from the upcoming [[PvP Arena]] minigame. It can only be used in [[PvP]] combat, and requires no [[Defence]] level to be worn.

It is worn in combination with the [[Calamity breeches]] to achieve the designated set effect, depending on which headgear is worn.
